code: import{Fetch}from'../components/Fetch';import{BaseConfig}from'../config/AppConfig';export var RequestOptions={get:function get(){return{method:'GET',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}};},post:function post(data){return{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(data)};}};export var FactoryService={Update:function Update(data){return Fetch("".concat(BaseConfig.apiUrl,"/Photo/Update"),RequestOptions.post(data));},CloseAll:function CloseAll(){return Fetch("".concat(BaseConfig.apiUrl,"/Photo/CloseAllSockets"),RequestOptions.get());},AddAlbum:function AddAlbum(data){return Fetch("".concat(BaseConfig.apiUrl,"/Photo/AddAlbum"),RequestOptions.post(data));}};
